content: In the next update I’ve added a surprise for everyone who has unlocked premium and added a Flappy Bird style game called Flap M. Compete against fellow players and submit your score to be featured on the leaderboard! Coming soon!
title: Flap M Game
Update - 01 July 2024
content: I’m busy working on lots of new features and improvements. Specifically ensuring iOS 18 compatibility. You may see some unexpected behaviour from M whilst I test some new code.
